name: Vacaketion
description:
This game was developed in 7 days for VR Jam 2020.

You’ve been working from home for too long and you deserve a scrumptious holiday. But there’s only one thing you like more than holidays and that’s cake. All the cake. So how about combining these two marvellous things into one eggcellent package.

How can you bring all your cake on holiday with you without waking up your butter half? Use your silent baker skills and extendable multi use greedy hands to move kitchen items out of your path, and grab hold of the delicious pieces of cake for your food odyssey.

You can download the app directly from SideQuest as well: https://sidequestvr.com/app/973

This game has been developed for Oculus Rift / Rift-S as well as Oculus Quest and Quest + Link. Any other HMDs are not tested and may not work well.  But I have enabled OpenVR in the build so you can always check out and see if it works for you! :)
